title: BASF
description: BASF's brand palette features colors ranging from deep blues like 004A96 and 21A0D2 to vibrant greens like 00793A and 65AC1E, complemented by bold tones of orange (F39500) and red (C50022). These colors are sourced and provided through their official brand portal, highlighting BASF's focus on maintaining a dynamic and recognizable brand identity globally.
